original_title: What the World Needs Now: Words by Hal David
overview: Hosted by Bette Midler, enjoy a musical tribute to the man who wrote some of the most enduring songs in American popular music. Lyricist Hal David and composer Burt Bacharach dominated the pop-music charts in the 1960s and early â€™70s, crafting dozens of timeless Top 40 hits.
title: What the World Needs Now: Words by Hal David
